fun_moment.text: The time Lady Wawa bit Weevil X and he shrieked like a little girl!

about.fun_fact: Thuggs look so much alike they can’t even tell each other apart!
about.text: This grumpy guard is a minion of the WEB – the Weevil Extermination Bureau! Serving the arch-enemies of the Secret Weevil Service, Thugg doesn’t exactly have a mind of his own. No one is sure which Thugg is the real Thugg, since there are hundreds of clones of him!
